items.sentence: Please cancel my order and refund the money.
Please do not leave your luggage unattended.
Please give me a piece of paper to write on.
Tom is no more suspicious than anybody else.
Tom is now attending a conference in Boston.
Tom put his arms around Mary and hugged her.
I used to be a singer in a heavy metal band.
I used to go out with friends every weekend.
I think Tom didn\'t really enjoy doing that.
I think Tom didn\'t understand the question.
I think Tom doesn\'t speak French very well.
Could you please briefly introduce yourself?
You really should\'ve stayed where you were.
I love the smell of pancakes in the morning.
I pawned my guitar in order to pay the rent.
What did you plant in your garden this year?
How long do I have to wait for the next bus?
I\'m sure that\'s what Tom would\'ve wanted.
Tom has trouble remembering people\'s names.
Tom hasn\'t heard from Mary since last June.
